name: Should return status 401 when attempting to delete a product review without valid token
Should create a product review with rating 0 when request body is missing the rating parameter
Should return status 404 when attempting to create a product review informing an invalid product_id
Should return status 400 when attempting to create a product review with invalid data type
Should return status 400 when attempting to create a product review without informing product_id, review, reviewer or reviewer e-mail
Should return 404 when updating a product review informing wrong product_id
Should return status 401 when attempting to create a product review informing an invalid token
Should return 401 when updating a product review without a valid token
Should return status 409 when attempting to create a duplicated product review
Should return status 404 when attempting to delete a product review without informing the id
